bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, with rashes of varying color. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 , dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 治小兒五色丹方 , “Recipe to cure children [suffering from] multi-color cinnabar”, writes: 犀角、羚羊角、豬屎汁、黃龍湯，五色丹毒，飲二合，並塗 , “ Xi jiao , ling yang jiao , hog feces juice, and the decoction with huang long , in the case of multi-color cinnabar poison , drink 2 ge and also apply externally”.
